[h1]PORTAL 2: [/h1]

[b] Portal 2 é um dos melhores jogos que já joguei na minha vida, ao contrario do portal 1 que se parece mais um jogo de teste da valve (não estou dizendo que é ruim) portal 2 é bem mais detalhado, com uma historia rica e divertida, o jogo é bem engraçado, com personagens marcantes e cativantes, um plot twist incrível e uma jogabilidade fantástica, os gráficos deste jogo é bastante bonito com momentos de se abrir a boca, alem disso o jogo é bastante difícil se você for burro igual a mim, ficara preso numa sessão por horas mas resumindo portal 2 é literalmente incrível, vale cada centavo que for gasto neste game [/b]
Mega geile Zeit damit und einfach mega bock auf geile Rätsel und Puzzle

Cave Johnson is the only thing that makes this game better than Portal. 9/10

Fun fact: Portal 2 is the highest rated game on Steam, and for good reason! This is quite easily one of the best games I have ever played, and I have played A LOT of games. If you haven't played Portal 2 yet, Pick it up for 2 bucks during a sale. You have no reason not to play this.

Portal 2 expands on the characters and world of Portal, with an almost staggering amount more cinematic flare than the original. Though in doing so, it sacrifices the elegant simplicity of the original. If you can accept that Portal 2 isn’t ‘trying’ to accomplish the same thing as Portal 1 and accept it for its narrative strengths, then you’ll have just as much fun as the original. In addition to the single player campaign, Portal 2 also possesses a co-op campaign that’s definitely worth playing if you can find someone willing. All that praise being said, I don’t feel as though Portal 2 is as much of a ‘must-play’ as Portal 1. If Portal 1 left you wanting more Portal-Puzzles, then it’ll deliver, but if you felt the ending of Portal 1 left you satisfied, then I don’t feel like anyone should force themselves through Portal 2 just for the sake of it.

Now this, THIS is how you do a video game sequel. Portal 2, much like it's predecessor, is a fantastic game despite it's age. Everything you could've possibly want more from the previous game is here and refined to perfection. More uses of the portal gun, more physic based puzzles, more lore, more characters, even better soundtrack, a co-op mode, what more do you want?  Portal 2 breaks free of the enclosed space of the original game's world and thrusts you into the enormous Aperture Laboratory allowing for an incredible journey that everyone should experience at least once. What more can be said except go play Portal 2, it's awesome, you KNOW it's awesome. 10/10

This game is a great example of a great game with a amazing backstory.

One of my favorites. Great visuals, great soundtrack, and most importantly, great gameplay.
Singleplayer story has so much replayability, co-op campaign is great to do with friends, and community made levels add essentially infinite test chambers.
Could not recommend enough.

This game is super fun and well worth 10 dollars the game has way more levels than u think in solo. multiplayer is also very very fun. Plus you can build your own levels and test other peoples levels so technically theres infinite levels

This is a really good game, the story telling is amazing, the gameplay stands out massively and the puzzles are fair and most of the time they are solvable with a bit of thought while not being to complicated. The only downside to the almost perfect game is chapter 6 and 7, the open overworld makes it too complicated and forces you to look too far ahead. 

Except for that this is a solid game 9/10.

This game is fun and mind challenging. it has a good story. The dialogues are interesting and humorous.
I would recommend this game to everyone. 10/10 :)

Игра определённо выстояла испытание временем. В 2021 году все ещё интересно, и увлекательно. Valve правильно сделали, что уделили больше времени сюжету, а не механикам - вся эта история с порталами уже не так увлекательна.
Персонажи, шутки, подача - всё было отлично. Классное интерактивное кино на пару часов.
very fun yes, has many secrets and cool movement
